channel.title: Noob question: midi keyboard
channel.description: hello guys, i just started patching, and i'm pretty new to axoloti. i can't get my usb midi controllers to work with axoloti core. the only thing that's working is the "midi/in/cc/any"-node. the midi-in-helppatch doesn't react when i press the keys on my keystation32 or the buttons on my korg padkontrol. am i doing something wrong?

item.title: Noob question: midi keyboard
item.dc:creator: @breakin
item.description:
@breakin wrote:

hello guys,
i just started patching, and i'm pretty new to axoloti. i can't get my usb midi controllers to work with axoloti core. the only thing that's working is the "midi/in/cc/any"-node. the midi-in-helppatch doesn't react when i press the keys on my keystation32 or the buttons on my korg padkontrol. am i doing something wrong?
